name: Unarchived channels can be searched the same as before they where archived

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)
customFields.Update notes:
Steve Mudie — Wednesday, December 16, 2020 12:18 PM
• Removed precondition based upon comments left in this test execution

inline.description:
Unarchived channels can be searched the same as before they where archived
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Post some text in the channel such as "Pineapple"
  2. Archive the channel
  3. Unarchive the channel
  4. Ensure that Allow user to search archived channels is disabled
  5. Search for the post from step 1
inline.expectedResult: • Post is returned by search, since it's not archived anymore

customFields.Related ticket(s):
• [HW Candidate] Web/Desktop: Add "Unarchive Channel" option to archived channels menu — MM-12330
  • [HW Candidate] Mobile: Add "Unarchive Channel" option to the channel info screen — MM-20804
